text: Unke baap ne kaha “main isko hargiz tumhare saath na bhejunga jab tak ke tum Allah ke naam se mujhko paimaan (pledge) na de do ke isey mere paas zaroor wapas lekar aaogey, illa yeh ke kahin tum gher hi liye jao”. Jab unhon ne usko apne apne paiman de diye to usne kaha “dekho, hamare is qaul par Allah nigehbaan hai”
